$comment: Documents according to this schema should be written in English
title: RIR Proposal Exchange Format
description: A common format to share information about policy proposals between RIRs

phase.title: Phase
phase.$comment: Different RIRs use different workflows, we use this generic terminology for each RIR's PDP Phases
AFRINIC: Draft Policy (= Discussion) -> Last-call -> Ratification -> Implementation -> Implemented
APNIC: Discussion -> Last-call -> Board Endorsement (Ratification) -> Implementation -> Implemented
ARIN: Policy Proposal (= Discussion) -> Draft Policy (= Review) -> Recommended Draft Policy (= Recommended) -> Last-call -> Board Review (Ratification) -> Implementation -> Implemented
LACNIC: Discussion -> Last-call -> Ratification -> Implementation -> Implemented
RIPE NCC: Discussion -> Review -> Last-call -> Implementation -> Implemented
When a proposal is between phases, it is recommended to list the upcoming phase instead of the concluded phase

state.description: The state within the PDP Phase
state.$comment: Not all states make sense for all phases, use them sensibly
When a proposal is between phases, it is recommended to list the upcoming phase instead of the concluded phase
Concluded is mostly intended for end-phases like Implemented and Withdrawn

id.title: ID
id.description: The proposal identifier as defined by the RIR, without any version suffixes

previous-id.title: Previous ID
previous-id.description: When a policy proposal turns into a draft, some RIRs give it a different identifier

topics.title: Topics
topics.description: A list of common topics relevant to this policy proposal

items.$comment: Please use defined topics where possible

versions.title: Versions
versions.description: A list of versions, preferably in chronological order (oldest first)

current-phase-start.title: Current phase start
current-phase-start.description: The start date of the current phase (may be in the future)

current-phase-end.title: Current phase planned end
current-phase-end.description: The planned end date of the current phase (may be in the past)

current-state.title: Current state
current-state.description: Policy Development Process state within the current phase

allOf.$comment: Don't specify a working group URL without naming the working group
